title: Random DC?
body: Got into a game of LOL, and 5 minutes in i randomly disconnected... my internet was fine and my ping was around 40, why is this happening? it also happened again in the same game and multiple times in the lobby.

replies.body:
Given that the disconnects seem to happen not only in-game, but in the client as well, it seems like there is some sort of connection issue between your computer and our servers.  To get this resolved, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!  It has the most common solutions that should resolve this issue.

Give me a heads up if you are still experiencing issues!
